On this page

PACKAGE_SAME_GO_PACKAGE ‚Äã

Categories:

  • MINIMAL
  • BASIC
  • DEFAULT

This rule checks that all files with a given package are in the same Go package.

Examples ‚Äã

Bad ‚Äã

proto
// File: pkg/foo.proto

syntax = "proto3";

package pkg;

option go_package = "example.com/foo/bar";
1
2
3
4
5
6
7
proto
// File: pkg/bar.proto

syntax = "proto3";

package pkg;

option go_package = "example.com/foo/baz";
1
2
3
4
5
6
7

Good ‚Äã

proto
// File: pkg/foo.proto

syntax = "proto3";

package pkg;

option go_package = "example.com/foo/bar";
1
2
3
4
5
6
7
proto
// File: pkg/bar.proto

syntax = "proto3";

package pkg;

option go_package = "example.com/foo/bar";
1
2
3
4
5
6
7
